about_the_game:
White Collar Civilian Pack

This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors.
It's a neat suit, fit for a gentle survivor.

White Collar Civilian's Pack includes the following items:

White Collar Civilian's Hat
White Collar Civilian's Suit
White Collar Civilian's Gloves
White Collar Civilian's Shoes
White Collar Civilian's Watch

How to apply a Skin to Equipment

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.
